content: As a reader encountering this passage for the first time, I may feel drawn to the introspective and contemplative nature of the text. The mention of connecting with the content can evoke feelings of curiosity and a desire to delve deeper into the meaning behind the words. The reference to "will it run?" may spark thoughts about uncertainty, progress, or potential obstacles to be overcome. Overall, my initial connection to the content would likely involve a sense of intrigue and a willingness to explore where the passage leads.
